<a id="CameraTexture"></a>

# CameraTexture

**Inherits:** [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture provided by a [CameraFeed](CameraFeed.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This texture gives access to the camera texture provided by a [CameraFeed](CameraFeed.md).

\ **Note:** Many cameras supply YCbCr images which need to be converted in a shader.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="CameraTexture_property_camera_feed_id"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **camera_feed_id** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CameraTexture_property_camera_feed_id)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_camera_feed_id**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_camera_feed_id**\ (\ )

The ID of the [CameraFeed](CameraFeed.md) for which we want to display the image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CameraTexture_property_camera_is_active"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **camera_is_active** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CameraTexture_property_camera_is_active)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_camera_active**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_camera_active**\ (\ )

Convenience property that gives access to the active property of the [CameraFeed](CameraFeed.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CameraTexture_property_which_feed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[FeedImage](CameraServer.md#enum_CameraServer_FeedImage) **which_feed** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CameraTexture_property_which_feed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_which_feed**\ (\ value\: [FeedImage](CameraServer.md#enum_CameraServer_FeedImage)\ )
- [FeedImage](CameraServer.md#enum_CameraServer_FeedImage) **get_which_feed**\ (\ )

Which image within the [CameraFeed](CameraFeed.md) we want access to, important if the camera image is split in a Y and CbCr component.
